hero_title: The Digital Marketplace for Fresh Produce
hero_subtitle: Connecting producers directly with businesses. Bid on fresh, quality agricultural goods in real-time auctions.
hero_title_2: From Our Fields to Your Table
hero_subtitle_2: Discover the richness of Indonesia's top agricultural commodities.
hero_subtitle_3: Access premium seafood through our transparent auction platform.
featured_auctions_subtitle: Get in on the action with these trending auctions.
how_it_works_subtitle: A simple, transparent, and efficient process.
find_products_desc: Browse our diverse marketplace or search for specific goods you need.
place_bids_desc: Enter our real-time auction rooms and place competitive bids on items.
win_ship_desc: Secure your products and arrange seamless logistics with our trusted partners.
trusted_partners_subtitle: A network of industry leaders supporting our marketplace.
bid_history_desc: A record of your recent bidding activity.
footer_tagline: The future of agricultural trade, today.
browse_by_category_subtitle: Explore our marketplace by product category.
featured_processed_products_subtitle: Discover leading processed food products from Indonesia.
export_feature_desc: Partner with our verified exporters to bring your products to the international stage. We help you meet quality standards and simplify logistics.
export_partner_program_subtitle: Exporters are verified users who have successfully completed 5 transactions and meet legal export requirements.
why_join_subtitle: Unlock your business's full potential by reaching international buyers.
benefit_1_desc: Expand your reach beyond local markets and tap into a global network of buyers.
benefit_2_desc: Our admin validation ensures your products meet international export quality standards.
benefit_3_desc: Work with our trusted logistics partners for seamless and efficient shipping.
how_it_works_subtitle_exporter: A clear path for users to start exporting.
exporter_step_1_desc: The first step is to register as a Producer or Bidder and get verified on our platform.
exporter_step_2_desc: Build your track record by successfully completing at least five transactions (selling as a Producer or winning as a Bidder).
exporter_step_3_desc: After fulfilling the transaction requirements, upload your legal documents for verification. These must include a legal entity deed (PT, CV, etc.), an NPWP (Tax ID), and one valid business license (e.g., SIUP).
exporter_step_4_desc: Congratulations! Your status will be upgraded, and you can now access export facilities and mentor other producers.
start_your_journey_now: Your journey to becoming an exporter begins by registering as a producer.
join_program_desc: Fill out the form below to start your journey to the global market.
products_to_export_placeholder: e.g. Arabica Coffee Beans, Frozen Shrimp
sell_your_product_desc: Fill in the details below to create a new auction listing.
admin_verification_note: Your product will be reviewed by an admin before being listed for auction.
fill_all_fields_for_suggestion: Please fill all fields (name, description, category, and image) to get a price suggestion.
price_suggestion_success_desc: The AI has successfully suggested a starting price.
price_suggestion_error_desc: Failed to get price suggestion from AI. Please try again.
product_submitted_desc: Your product has been successfully submitted for admin verification.
dashboard_subtitle: Manage your activities and view your performance on AgriBid.
my_products_desc: View and manage your product listings for auction.
bidder_dashboard_desc: Track your bids and auction activity.
buyer_dashboard_desc: Track your bids and auction activity.
partner_dashboard_desc: Manage producer verifications and mentoring schedules.
vendor_dashboard_desc: Manage your logistics and shipping orders.
mentoring_schedule_desc: View and manage upcoming mentoring sessions.
exporter_dashboard_desc: Access export-ready commodities and manage your shipments.
browse_export_commodities_desc: Find export-ready products from verified Indonesian producers.
manage_imports_desc: Track your won auctions and international shipments.
verified_producers_desc: Connect directly with our network of trusted producers.
membership_card_subtitle: This card is proof of your verified membership on AgriBid.
regulation_1: This card is personal and non-transferable.
regulation_2: Members must comply with the terms and conditions of AgriBid Indonesia.
regulation_3: The card must be presented upon request for verification.
regulation_4: Misuse of the card will result in membership revocation.
membership_benefits_title: Benefits of Being an AgriBid Member
membership_benefits_subtitle: Unlock exclusive features and gain a competitive edge in the marketplace.
benefit_exclusive_auctions_desc: Get access to member-only auctions with premium commodities.
benefit_verified_network_desc: Transact with confidence within a trusted and verified community.
benefit_priority_support_desc: Receive faster assistance from our dedicated support team.
benefit_membership_card_desc: Get a digital card as proof of your verified status in the AgriBid ecosystem.
admin_dashboard_desc: Oversee and manage the entire platform.
pending_product_verifications_desc: Review and approve or reject new product submissions.
user_management_desc: View, manage, and monitor all users on the platform.
confirm_delete_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the product "{{productName}}".
edit_product_desc: Update the details for your product listing.
bid_must_be_higher: Your bid must be at least {{amount}}.
bid_placed_desc: Your bid of {{amount}} has been recorded.
payment_info_desc: All transactions are processed through the joint account: BCA 5735434656 a/n Azwar Riyadh Subarkah (admin). An administration fee of 10% will be applied to the final transaction amount.
upload_documents_and_check_eligibility: Upload your legal documents and use our AI assistant to check your eligibility.
submit_for_admin_verification_desc: Once eligible, you can submit your application for final review by the admin.
ai_check_error_desc: Failed to perform AI task. Please try again.
mentored_producers_desc: Educate and manage up to 10 producers under your guidance.
global_demand_subtitle: Real-time insights into the global demand for Indonesian commodities.
log_in_to_check_eligibility: You must be logged in to check eligibility.
payment_management_desc: View and manage all transactions on the platform.
payment_marked_as_paid_desc: Transaction {{transactionId}} has been marked as paid.
shipping_orders_desc: Manage shipping jobs assigned from successful auctions.
auction_requirements_desc: Make sure your product listing includes a clear photo, detailed description, and accurate specifications to pass admin verification.
export_product_requirements_subtitle: Ensure your products meet these standards to be eligible for the global market.
export_req_1_desc: Products must meet international quality standards (e.g., Grade A, Premium Quality) and be free from defects.
export_req_2_desc: Relevant certifications such as Halal, Organic, HACCP, or GAP are often required by international buyers.
export_req_3_desc: Packaging must be durable, suitable for long-distance shipping, and labeled according to the destination country's regulations.
latest_shipping_reports_desc: Monitor recent shipping status updates from vendors.
delivery_marked_desc: Order {{orderId}} has been marked as delivered. Waiting for buyer confirmation.
report_sent_desc: A status report for order {{orderId}} has been sent to the admin.
delivery_order_terms: This document certifies that the goods listed above have been dispatched for delivery. Please present this document upon arrival. This is not a tax invoice.
This document certifies that the goods listed above have been dispatched for delivery. Please present this document upon arrival. This is not a tax invoice.
signup_page_desc: Enter your information to create an account and choose your role
country_selection_required: Please select your country to register as an International Buyer.
login_page_desc: Enter your email below to login to your account.
payment_instruction_desc: Payment instructions will be provided after your account has been approved by the admin.
registration_submitted_desc: Your account is pending admin approval. You will be notified upon activation.
direct_from_producer_title: Direct from Producer to Global Market
direct_from_producer_desc: Our platform cuts out the middleman, connecting you directly with verified producers for fresh, export-quality goods.
benefit_supply_chain_desc: Reduce costs and time by transacting directly with producers.
benefit_guaranteed_quality_desc: Every producer is verified to ensure top-tier product quality.
benefit_transparent_transaction_desc: Enjoy a clear and secure bidding and payment process.
try_different_search: Try adjusting your search or category filters.
must_be_verified_to_download: Your account must be verified to download the card.
membership_verification_desc: Review user details and update their membership status.
login_role_invalid_desc: Invalid user role specified in email.
demo_login_instructions: For demo, use any role (e.g., admin, petani, buyer, international_buyer) as the email prefix and "password" as the password.
bidding_activity_desc: How your bidding activity is distributed across categories.
sop_foreign_buyer_desc: Learn the standard procedures for importing from Indonesia.
sop_foreign_buyer_subtitle: A step-by-step guide to importing agricultural commodities from Indonesia through AgriBid.
latest_shipping_reports_desc: Monitor recent shipping status updates from vendors.
delivery_marked_desc: Order {{orderId}} has been marked as delivered. Waiting for buyer confirmation.
report_sent_desc: A status report for order {{orderId}} has been sent to the admin.
sop_step_1_desc: Must be a legally registered company in your country with valid import rights.
sop_step_2_desc: Submit Letter of Intent (LOI) or request a price quote and product sample.
sop_step_3_desc: Agree on pricing, quantity, Incoterm (e.g. FOB, CIF), payment terms, and delivery schedule.
sop_step_4_desc: Issue Letter of Credit or Telegraphic Transfer (T/T) based on contract terms.
sop_step_5_desc: Seller will arrange shipment and prepare all required export documents.
sop_step_6_desc: Use documents to clear the shipment at your country's customs office.
sop_step_7_desc: Pay any applicable import taxes, duties, and fees as required by your country.
doc_checklist_2_purpose: Required by some countries like India, Egypt, etc.
doc_checklist_4_doc: Letter of Credit (L/C) or Payment Proof
doc_checklist_6_purpose: Phytosanitary, Halal, Organic, etc., based on commodity type
doc_checklist_7_purpose: Proof of terms agreed upon by both parties
post_request_desc: Let producers know what you need.
post_request_page_desc: Let producers know what you need by filling out the form below.
specifications_placeholder: e.g., Moisture content <12%, non-GMO, Halal certified...
request_posted_desc: Your request has been posted to the marketplace.
international_demand_desc: Fulfill demand from around the world. Here are the latest product requests from our international buyers.
